name: Finders Keepers (itch) (Serviux, PattyMacC)
description: In this wacky party game, 4 players compete to try and gather all the unique furniture items on their lists and bring them back to the dropoff point as fast as possible. The player with who completes their list first or the player with the most points will be declared the winner. Add on top of that stunning, blocking, and stealing from your opponents, and you have the perfect combination of chaotic fun!
